short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes YouTube 'Context' windows containing corporate-approved 'fact check' content and other propaganda.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you sick of propaganda boxes posted by "fact checkers" on your YouTube videos?  Use this simple extension to get rid of them!

This extension merely adds a CSS stylesheet override to YouTube video pages and does not contain any scripts or access to external resources.
